definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: For differentiating bacteria based on liquefaction of gelation.
sentences.chinese: 供鑑別細菌液化明膠用。

sentences.english: I take my gas phase composition out and I re-liquefy it.
sentences.chinese: 把氣相部分拿出來再液化。

sentences.english: The sand buried shallowly may be liquefaction.
sentences.chinese: 埋藏較淺的砂土會發生液化。

sentences.english: A process that is used to liquefy nitrogen.
The reasons for crack appearance in LPG spherical tank and the methods for prevention.
sentences.chinese: 介紹液化石油氣球罐檢驗中裂紋形成原因及預防措施。

sentences.english: Tumor coagulative necrosis combining with center liquefactive necrosis.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤凝固性壞死合併中心液化壞死。

sentences.english: The numerical simulation for fire environment of PLG tank is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對液化氣儲罐的火災環境的數值模擬研究。

sentences.english: When the larve was infected with recombinant virus, the liquefaction couldn't be observed.
sentences.chinese: 用所得到的重組病毒感染蟲體，發現蟲體不液化。

sentences.english: Unlike sodium-sulfur batteries, vanadium-flow batteries don’t need to be heated to high temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 與硫化鈉不同的是，液化釩電池不需要加熱到高溫。

sentences.english: This is a cerebral abscess. There is a liquefactive center with yellow pus surrounded by a thin wall.
sentences.chinese: 腦膿腫，可見薄壁並附有黃色膿液的液化中心。

sentences.english: Hydroliquefaction of lignified biomass polysaccharide is studied at low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 研究了木化生物質聚糖的低溫加氫液化。

sentences.english: The photos showed that, after some surges, the silver layer reached its melting point, causing it to liquefy.
sentences.chinese: 照片顯示若干次浪湧後，銀板達到熔點液化。

sentences.english: The chemicals determined from the bio-oil are valuable indicating a wide range of application of the bio-oil.
sentences.chinese: 對液化油成分的分析，表明了它具有廣闊的應用前景。

sentences.english: If methane is cooled and compressed , it liquefies.
sentences.chinese: 如果甲烷受到冷卻和壓縮，它就會液化。

sentences.english: Last year, the government blocked several new proposals for coal liquefaction facilities.
sentences.chinese: 去年，政府阻止了幾項對液化煤工廠提出的新的建議。

definition: to vaporize/evaporation/carburetion/氣|气[qi4] transformation in TCM (i.e. transformation of yin yang vital breath)/unvoicing of voiced consonant
